exam.question: He is looking for a job that will give him greater ______for career development.

answer.explain: 空间， 机会。句意： 他正在寻找一份可以带给他更多发展空间的工作。insight： 洞察力， 见识； phase： 阶段， 状态。

sentences.sContent: incentives to maintain the momentum of European integration
sentences.sCn: 保持欧洲一体化发展势头的激励措施

sentences.sContent: Governments often lose momentum in their second term of office.
sentences.sCn: 政府往往会在第二届任期中丧失冲劲。

sentences.sContent: ...gaining momentum from mere exposure as it did so...
...By far the biggest type of momentum that comes into play when it comes to changing our energy systems is economic momentum...
...and they have a lot of momentum once they are set in motion...
...Another type of momentum we have to think about when planning for changes in our energy systems is labor-pool momentum...
...But the momentum of incandescent lighting does not stop there...
...understanding energy system inertia and momentum can help you decide whether their plans are feasible...

phrases.pCn: 动量守恒；动量不变原理

remMethod.val: moment(瞬间) ＋ um → 冲力在瞬间迸发 → 冲力

trans.tranCn: 动力， 冲力， 势头； 动量
trans.tranOther: the ability to keep increasing, developing, or being more successful
